Html:
Hi,
Is there a limitation to the number of columns for PHPExcelWriterExcel2007? I am using it to write data into a file from an oracle database and when it exceeds a certain threshold number of columns it gives me this error. Based on the query, this threshold number of columns at which this error pos up keeps changing and that's why it puzzles me.
Thanks!
PHPExcel has the same limits as "real" Excel when it comes to column numbers, which is IV I think.

I am certain that the max number of columns is way less that it would never get to 'IV'. Any ideas why else could it be causing the error. Will it help if I mail a sample file that was generated that gave me this error
Please do, my email is maarten AT phpexcel .DOT. net
